translations: adv.造成严重外伤地，造成损伤地

phrs.translation: 重建受损的前牙的痛楚, 脾脏重建损坏以前

sentences.sentence: Objective: To evaluate the clinical efficacy of immediate implantation in the traumatically area.
sentences.translation: 目的：评价外伤后前牙即刻种植的临床效果。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To evaluate the effectiveness of the segmental arch technique in fixing replanted traumatically avulsed permanent teeth.
sentences.translation: 目的：评价正畸片段弓技术应用于固定外伤脱位再植牙的效果。
